channel.title: CVE Feed for Event Espresso -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Event Espresso -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-1002026|2024-09-16T22:45:10.290Z -- event%20espresso -- event%20expresso%20free
item.description: Vulnerability in wordpress plugin Event Expresso Free v3.1.37.11.L, The function edit_event_category does not sanitize user-supplied input via the $id parameter before passing it into an SQL statement.

item.title: CVE-2023-27437|2024-06-04T17:24:59.444Z -- event%20espresso -- event%20espresso%204%20decaf
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Event Espresso Event Espresso 4 Decaf allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects Event Espresso 4 Decaf: from n/a through 4.10.44.Decaf.

item.title: CVE-2023-27437|2024-08-02T12:09:43.471Z -- event%20espresso -- event%20espresso%204%20decaf
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Event Espresso Event Espresso 4 Decaf allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects Event Espresso 4 Decaf: from n/a through 4.10.44.Decaf.
